channel.title: Acolyte ideas compendium. (Cult killer)
channel.description:
The Acolyte is a class that has potential to make the cult more interesting or at least more varied. Please list ideas and why they are better than the other ideas.
My own idea's are:
Day ability - nightshade poisoning (1 use). Poison the target. Just like the assassin.
Night ability - Blood drain (1 use). Make the target bleed just like the Hunter.
These Ability's are not particularly strong as far as killing Ability's go but are still impactful and let you fake claim Hunter.
Meny people have mentioned that a cult killer should use the erraticates of the cult leader. Another idea that uses that idea is this:
Day ability 1: Transmute power - convert 1 use of erraticate into 1 use of both nightshade and blood drain
Day ability 2: Nightshade - Poison the target (0 uses)
Night ability 1: Erraticate - Kill the target (uses shared with cult leader)
Night ability 2: Blood drain - Make the target bleed (0 uses)
This idea is arguably stronger as you can now fake claim Knight. But it also means that you won't be adding as meny additional kills per Acolyte.
Please post additional idea's below.
